policies.name: public-posts
policies.description: users are allowed to see public posts

policies.name: private-posts
policies.predicate: SELECT * FROM Post, UserContext WHERE Post.p_private = 1 AND UserContext.id = Post.p_author
policies.description: users are allowed to see their private posts they authored

policies.name: no-role-changing
policies.description: users cannot change their permissions level within the system
